channel.title: Vespa on Juan Orozco
channel.description: Recent content in Vespa on Juan Orozco

item.title: Radio Flyer “scooter”
item.description: Our kids are ready for trikes. While searching for some on Amazon I stumbled upon the beauty.  I was actually hunting down big wheels but I think the Vespa inspired styling has stolen my heart.  We'll be getting two of these in the near future.
